author: Ted
content:
And another thing that's cool about these images and a number of other recent posts here... Is the fact that you are showing us the mundane in ways that ROCK! The busy-ness of the train yard should be pedestrian but your eye has captured it in a captivating sense.

Yes, partially the framing technique is helping, but the light, shaping and sense of motion all collude to do what so many of us fail to do... Slash through the veil of banality which causes us to simply not see, or show, what's really around us to people who are not around us.
